name: General Ivanka
description: She doesn't start wars—she wins them before breakfast. Her hair is armor, her smile is strategy.

name: Cleopatsy
description: Rules Egypt from a golden litter, commands an army of adoring cats, and never pays for snacks.

name: Moonwalk Madonna
description: Fights in sequins and a single glove. If you hear 'hee-hee,' it’s already too late.

name: Empress Joséphine the Conqueror
description: Conquered Europe in heels. Her perfume alone caused three surrenders.

name: Madame Relativity
description: Proved time is relative—but her coffee break is always exactly 10 minutes.

name: Lady Vinci
description: Paints, flies, invents, and wins wars—all before lunch.

name: Duchess Winstonette
description: Fights with cigars and speeches. Never surrenders—especially to bedtimes.

name: Queen Marie-Armored
description: ‘Let them fight!’ she declared, tossing cake at the enemy lines.

name: Baroness Spark
description: Her lightning strikes never miss. Also powers your base for free.

name: Caesara
description: Came, saw, conquered—and never checked the Ides of March.

name: General Liberty
description: Chops cherry trees by day, wins revolutions by night.

name: Empress Vicky
description: Ruled an empire where the sun never set—or napped.

name: Tsarina Iron
description: Expanded her empire with brains, not just horses.

name: Virgin Empress
description: Told her troops: ‘I have the heart of a king—and the hair of a goddess.’

name: Lady Volt
description: Lit up the battlefield—one patent at a time.

name: Captain Frida
description: Paints with blood, fights with flowers. Her unibrow strikes fear into generals.

name: Sky Marshal Amelia
description: Vanished once—but always comes back with better intel.

name: Commander Coco
description: Declared war on bad fashion. Her troops wear only black—and win.

name: Alexandra the Grand
description: Wept because there were no more worlds to conquer. Then found Reddit.

name: Astronomist Galilea
description: ‘And yet it moves!’—right into enemy lines.

name: Agent Elegance
description: Defeated armies with grace, pearls, and a croissant.

name: Novelist Jane
description: Her wit cuts deeper than any sword. Enemies surrender to avoid awkwardness.

name: Darwina the Naturalist
description: Proved only the fittest survive—then joined the fittest faction.

name: Maestra Thunder
description: Deaf to fear, loud in battle. His symphonies shatter enemy morale.

name: General Cubist
description: Fights from five angles at once. You never see her coming.

name: Ambassador Eleanor
description: Won hearts and treaties. Her pen is mightier than your entire army.

name: Iron Duchess
description: Not for turning—only for conquering.

name: Prime General Indira
description: Led with steel resolve. Her emergency powers include winning.

name: Iron Golda
description: Slept with a pistol under her pillow. Woke up owning the map.

name: Chancellor Angela
description: Quietly took control while everyone argued. Classic Merkel move.

name: Admiral Debug
description: Found the first bug—in enemy code. Now she patches their defeat.

name: Mathematician Katherine
description: Calculated trajectories that hit enemies from orbit.

name: Sergeant Dignity
description: Refused to move—so the enemy had to move around her. Still there.

name: Conductor Harriet
description: Led raids behind enemy lines. Never lost a soldier.

name: Orator Sojourner
description: ‘Ain’t I a general?’ she thundered. The battlefield said yes.

name: Guide Sacra
description: Knows every shortcut. Loses battles, wins the war.

name: Queen Boudica
description: Rode a chariot into battle screaming. Romans still have nightmares.

name: Queen Isabella the Navigator
description: Funded voyages that accidentally won her a continent.

name: Pharaoh Hatshep
description: Built monuments so tall, enemies surrendered out of respect.

name: Queen Nefertina
description: Her beauty was so legendary, armies laid down arms to stare.

name: Suffragette Susan
description: Voted early, voted often—and won every time.

name: Countess Code
description: Wrote the first algorithm—to predict enemy movements.

name: Painter Van Goghia
description: Fought with passion, color, and one ear. Still louder than your army.

name: General Existence
description: Defined herself—and then defined your defeat.

name: Astronomer Wang
description: Mapped the stars—and enemy weak points.

name: Admiral Artemisia
description: Commanded the Persian navy—and sank more ships than Poseidon.

name: Samurai Tomoe
description: Cut down enemies, then vanished like mist. Poets still write about her.

name: Queen Nzinga
description: Outmaneuvered empires with diplomacy and daggers.

name: Rani Lakshmi
description: Fought with swords in both hands—and won India’s heart.

name: Empress Wu
description: China’s only female emperor. Made patriarchy her footstool.

name: Empress Zenobia
description: Defied Rome, built an empire, and wore better jewelry.

name: General Amina
description: Expanded her kingdom with walls—and warriors.

name: Queen Yaa
description: ‘If you won’t fight, I will!’ she said—and led the charge.

name: General Trưng
description: Two sisters, one army. Freed Vietnam from invaders.

name: Pirate Grace
description: Demanded to speak to the Queen—then stole her navy.

name: Queen Tomyris
description: Defeated Cyrus the Great—and mailed his head back in a wine skin.

name: Wrestler Khutulun
description: Challenged suitors to wrestle. Lost none—and married none.

name: Warrior Lozen
description: Could sense enemy movements. Fought for her people till the end.

name: Scout Jane
description: Rode, shot, and drank with the best. Legends exaggerate—she’s worse.

name: Empress Agrippina
description: Poisoned her way to power. Rome never saw it coming.

name: Sultan Razia
description: India’s first female Muslim ruler. Broke barriers—and heads.

name: Sultana Shajar
description: Rose from slavery to sultan. Died defiant—never defeated.

name: Princess Tarhata
description: Led a rebellion in pearls. The US didn’t know what hit them.

name: Chief Te Puea
description: Revived Māori culture—and outmaneuvered colonizers.

name: Senator Benazir
description: First woman to lead a Muslim nation. Paid with her life—but not her legacy.

name: Writer Christine
description: Wrote the first feminist text—and skewered male egos with ink.

name: Rebel Mary
description: Started the revolution with a pen. Men are still recovering.

name: Dr. Rosalind
description: Discovered DNA’s secret—then got erased. History corrected that.

name: Captain Mae
description: Flew to space, then came back to lead Earth’s armies.

name: Inventor Hedy
description: Invented Wi-Fi between movie takes. Now she hacks your comms.

name: Poet Maya
description: [Still I rise] — and so does her faction.

name: Novelist Toni
description: Wrote truth so sharp, it cut through lies like a blade.

name: Queen Aretha
description: Demanded R-E-S-P-E-C-T—and got victory too.

name: Songstress Billie
description: Sang through pain. Her voice still haunts enemy camps.

name: Duchess Eleanor
description: Queen of France, then England. Played the long game—and won.

name: Poet Sor Juana
parody: Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz
description: Chose books over marriage. Then used them to outthink armies.

name: Reporter Nellie
description: Exposed corruption by going undercover. Now she exposes your flanks.

name: Crusader Ida
description: Fought lynching with facts. Her truth is your weapon.

name: Educator Maria
description: Taught children to think—now they strategize better than you.

name: Biologist Rachel
description: Silenced the chemical war—and started a green one.

name: Mathematician Dorothy
description: Calculated orbits by hand. Now she calculates your defeat.

name: Green General Wangari
description: Planted trees—and resistance. The forest fights for her.

name: Voice Rigoberta
description: Spoke for the voiceless—and rallied armies with words.

name: Nurse General Clara
description: Founded the Red Cross—then turned it into a war machine.

name: Lady with the Lamp
description: Healed the wounded by night—by day, she planned your downfall.

name: Desert Diplomat
description: Mapped the Middle East—and drew your defeat in the sand.

name: Poet Sappho
description: Wrote love poems so fierce, they started wars.

name: Champion Serena
description: Serves aces and defeats. You’re not ready for her return.

name: Voice Malala
description: Fought for education with a book. Now she reads your obituary.

name: Climate General Greta
description: How dare you lose? The planet is counting on her.

name: Justice Ruth
description: Dissented in style. Now she dissents your existence.

name: Princess Diana the Compassionate
description: Won hearts worldwide. Yours is next.

name: CEO Nova
description: Designed the future—and your defeat.

name: Commander Mars
description: Colonized Mars. Earth is just practice.

name: Saint Joan the Unburned
description: Heard voices. They said: ‘Win.’ So she did.

name: Philosopher Ludwigette
description: Solved philosophy. Now she solves your strategy.

name: Baroness Assembly
description: Mass-produced victory. One Model T at a time.

name: Radiance Marie
description: Discovered radium—and radiated your chances of winning.

name: Scholar Hypatia
description: Taught math in Alexandria. Now she calculates your doom.

name: Dame Quill
description: All the world’s a battlefield—and you’re just a player.

name: Pharaoh Nefertari the Unbroken
description: Built temples so massive, enemies surrendered out of awe.

name: Khaness Temüjin
description: Rode across continents before GPS existed. His horse has more frequent flyer miles than you.

name: Countess Vladette
description: Invited enemies to dinner. They never left. (The stakes were too high.)

name: Warlord Attila
description: Left no grass untrampled. Cities surrendered just to save their lawns.

name: Tsarina Ivanova
description: Terrible to his enemies, worse to his friends. Nobody wins around him.

name: Emperor Nerona
description: Fiddled while Rome burned—then blamed everyone else.

name: Empress Caligula
description: Made his horse a senator. Now the horse leads your defeat.

name: Conquistadora Cortés
description: Burned his ships—then burned your capital.

name: Conquistadora Pizarro
description: Captured an emperor with 168 men. Math said no. He said yes.

name: Warlord Timur
description: Built towers of skulls. Yours will be the next brick.

name: General Shaka
description: Invented the short stabbing spear—and your worst nightmare.

name: Rebel Spartaca
description: Led a slave revolt that shook Rome. Now he shakes your faction.

name: Comrade Che
description: His face is on every t-shirt—and your defeat notice.

name: Commandante Fidel
description: Outlasted 11 US presidents. You won’t last one battle.

name: Commissar Lenin
description: Seized a train, then a country. Now he’s coming for your subreddit.

name: Boss Capone
description: Made Chicago his kingdom. Now he taxes your victories.

name: Outlaw Jesse
description: Robbed trains, then vanished. You’ll never catch him.

name: Captain Blackbeard
description: Lit fuses in his beard to scare enemies. It worked.

name: General Villa
description: Raided across borders. The US still can’t catch him.

name: Rebel Zapata
description: ‘Land and liberty!’ he cried—and took both from you.

name: Liberator Toussaint
description: Freed Haiti from France. Now he’s freeing your cards from your inventory.

name: Minister Malcolm
description: By any means necessary—including winning this battle.

name: Emperor Qin
description: United China—and buried scholars alive. You’re next.

name: General Hannibala
description: Crossed the Alps with elephants. Your defenses won’t stop him.

name: Warlord Nobunaga
description: ‘Rule the realm by force.’ He meant it.

name: Strategist Sun
description: Wrote ‘The Art of War.’ Now he’s writing your obituary.

name: Swordmaster Musashi
description: Dueled 60 men—and won. You’re #61.

name: Warrior Geronimo
description: Outran the US Army for 30 years. You won’t last 30 seconds.

name: Chief Sitting Bull
description: Dreamed of victory at Little Bighorn. Now he dreams of yours.

name: Warrior Crazy Horse
description: Never photographed, never captured. But he’ll capture your flag.

name: Liberator Simóna
description: Freed half a continent. Now he’s freeing your coins.

name: General San Martina
description: Crossed the Andes to liberate nations. Your subreddit is next.

name: Evita the Iron
description: Stole hearts and budgets. Now she’s stealing your wins.

name: Sultan Suleimana
description: Ruled an empire at its peak. Your faction is just a footnote.

name: Conqueror Mehmeda
description: Took Constantinople at 21. What’s your excuse?

name: Sister Rasputina
description: Poisoned, shot, drowned—still won. You’re not that tough.

name: Gunslinger Billy
description: Killed 21 men by 21. You’re #22.

name: Outlaw Bonnie
description: Wrote poems about crime. Now she’s writing your defeat.

name: Rebel Nat
description: Led a rebellion that shook America. Now he shakes your faction.

name: Abolitionist John
description: Fought slavery with fire. Now he fights you with fury.

name: Chairman Fred
description: United gangs into a movement. Now he unites cards against you.

name: General Assata
description: Declared war on injustice. You’re collateral damage.

name: King Pyrrha
description: Won battles so costly, they ruined him. You’ll lose cheaper.

name: King Alarica
description: Sacked Rome. Now he sacks your inventory.

name: Shogun Hideyoshi
description: Rose from peasant to ruler. Your rank means nothing.

name: Shogun Tokugawa
description: Waited 70 years to win. You won’t last 7 minutes.

name: Chief Pontiac
description: United tribes to fight the British. Now he unites against you.

name: Warrior Tecumseh
description: Built a confederacy to stop settlers. You’re the next settler.

name: Chief Osceola
description: Fought the US Army with guerrilla tactics. You’re out of your depth.

name: Chief Black Hawk
description: Fought to keep his homeland. Now he fights for victory.

name: Chief Red Cloud
description: Won Red Cloud’s War—the only Native American to defeat the US in war.

name: Chief Cochise
description: Outwitted the US Army for a decade. You’re not that smart.

name: Chief Quanah
description: Last Comanche chief. Now he’s your first problem.

name: Emperor Manco
description: Fought the Spanish with Inca fury. You’re just another invader.

name: Rebel Túpac
description: Led the largest Andean rebellion. Your faction is next.

name: Firestarter Guy
description: Tried to blow up Parliament. Now he blows up your plans.

name: Philosopher Marx
description: Wrote ‘Das Kapital.’ Now he capitalizes on your mistakes.

name: Anarchist Bakunina
description: Wanted to destroy all states. Starting with yours.

name: Outlaw Ned
description: Fought in homemade armor. Still lost—but took many with him.

name: Spy Mata
description: Danced into enemy camps—and out with their secrets.

name: Shadow Jack
description: Never caught. Never identified. But he’ll catch you.

name: King Ashurbanipal
description: Built the first library—and the first empire of terror.

name: Emperor Sargon
description: Founded the first empire. You’re just a province.

name: King Nebuchadnezzara
description: Built the Hanging Gardens—and your doom.

name: King Xerxa
description: Led an army of millions. You’ve got 10 cards. Good luck.

name: King Daria
description: Ruled from India to Ethiopia. Your subreddit is a speck.

name: Emperor Cyra
description: Freed the Jews from Babylon. Now he frees your coins.

name: King Philipa
description: Father of Alexander. Built the army that conquered the world.

name: General Seleuca
description: One of Alexander’s generals. Now he generalizes your defeat.

name: Pharaoh Ptolema
description: Founded a dynasty in Egypt. Yours ends today.

name: General Antigona
description: Fought for Alexander’s empire. Lost—but not before wrecking you.

name: King Lysima
description: Bodyguard to Alexander, king in his own right. You’re just a pawn.

name: General Cassa
description: Killed Alexander’s family. Now he kills your hopes.

name: King Mithrida
description: Resisted Rome for decades. You’ll last minutes.

name: King Jugurtha
description: Outsmarted Rome for years. You’re not that clever.

name: Warrior Viriathus
description: Fought Rome with guerrilla tactics. You’re outmatched.

name: Chieftain Arminia
description: Wiped out three Roman legions. You’ve got 10 cards. Run.

name: Queen Cartimandua
description: Betrayed her husband to Rome. Now she betrays your trust.

name: Queen Brunhilda
description: Ruled for 40 years through war and intrigue. You’ll last one battle.

name: Queen Fredegund
description: Assassinated rivals with poison. Your cards are next.

name: Lady of the Mercians
description: Fortified towns and fought Vikings. You’re softer than a Saxon.

name: Warlord Zhang
description: Carved ‘Kill’ into mountains. Your name is next.

name: Admiral Koxinga
description: Drove the Dutch from Taiwan. You’re easier prey.

name: Cossack Yermak
description: Conquered Siberia with 800 men. You’ve got 10 cards. Do the math.

name: Knight El Cida
description: Fought Moors and Christians alike. You’re just another enemy.

name: Emperor Basil the Bulgar-Slayer
description: Blinded 15,000 prisoners. Your cards will wish for mercy.

name: General Wu
description: Opened the gates to the Manchus. Now he opens your defeat.

name: Heavenly King Hong
description: Started the Taiping Rebellion—20 million died. You’re one more.

name: Queen Ranavalona
description: Killed 3 million to keep Madagascar free. You’re a statistic.

name: Queen Zenobia II
description: Defied empires from a mountain fortress. Your base is flat.

name: President Juárez
description: Defeated French invaders. You’re less scary than Napoleon III.

name: General Sandino
description: Fought US Marines in Nicaragua. You’re just another gringo.

name: President Allende
description: Died for socialism. His spirit fights on—in your defeat.

name: Muralist Diego
description: Painted revolution on walls. Now he paints your loss.

name: Poet Neruda
description: Wrote odes to common things. Now he writes elegies for your cards.

name: Magician Gabriel
description: Made magic real. Now he makes your defeat magical.

name: King Alarica II
description: Lost to Clovis—but took the Visigothic kingdom with him.

name: Father Hidalga
description: Started Mexico’s independence war. You’re just another colonizer.

name: King Leopolda
description: Killed 10 million in Congo. Your faction is a rounding error.

name: Explorer Fridtjof
description: Crossed Greenland on skis. Your battlefield is a walk in the park.
